title: Greeting Challenge
description: Print three different greetings on three separate lines.

title: Player Stats
description: Create two variables: `score` with a value of 100, and `lives` with a value of 3. Print the score on the first line and the lives on the second line.

title: Number Checker
description: Given a variable `number = 15`, write code to check if it's greater than 10. If it is, print 'The number is big'. Otherwise, print 'The number is small'.
